name: Link (itch) (qwerty3.14)
description:
Link is a game I made for extra credits game jam 4 'connections'.
The environment consists of a collection of rings when rings get close to each other they will connect. The arrow on the rings show which is ring is connected to which.

Music and Sound effects by Eric Matyas
www.soundimage.org

Source code:
https://github.com/qwerty3-14/LinkGame

Controls:

Pause - p

Sandbox Controls

Place ring - left click

remove ring - right click

change size of ring to place - scroll mouse

Vs. mode Controls

Vs. mode
move  forwardturn leftturn right
Shootplayer 1
WADSPACEplayer 2(keyboard)
Up arrow
Left arrow
Right arrow
RightAltplayer 2(controller)
D-pad upD-pad left
D-pad right
A/B/X/Y
